/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++0x -g    CMakeFiles/2player_snake.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/2player_snake.dir/playerSnake.cpp.o CMakeFiles/2player_snake.dir/sdl_functions.cpp.o CMakeFiles/2player_snake.dir/timer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/2player_snake.dir/mouse.cpp.o CMakeFiles/2player_snake.dir/deadscreen.cpp.o  -o 2player_snake -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDLmain -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL -lpthread -lSDL_image -lSDL_ttf -lSDLmain
